mapper.sql: ID, SUPPLIER_PRODUCTS_ID, CATEGORY_PARAM_ID, PARAM_VALUE, IS_DELETED, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_SMS_PRODUCT_PARAM (ID, SUPPLIER_PRODUCTS_ID, CATEGORY_PARAM_ID, PARAM_VALUE, IS_DELETED, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) values (#{id}, #{supplierProductsId}, #{categoryParamId}, #{paramValue}, #{isDeleted}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})

insert into T_SES_SMS_PRODUCT_PARAM
ID,
SUPPLIER_PRODUCTS_ID,
CATEGORY_PARAM_ID,
PARAM_VALUE,
IS_DELETED,
CREATED_AT,
UPDATED_AT,
#{id},
#{supplierProductsId},
#{categoryParamId},
#{paramValue},
#{isDeleted},
#{createdAt},
#{updatedAt},
mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_PRODUCT_PARAM
SUPPLIER_PRODUCTS_ID = #{supplierProductsId},
CATEGORY_PARAM_ID = #{categoryParamId},
PARAM_VALUE = #{paramValue},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt},
where ID = #{id}

update T_SES_SMS_PRODUCT_PARAM set SUPPLIER_PRODUCTS_ID = #{supplierProductsId}, CATEGORY_PARAM_ID = #{categoryParamId}, PARAM_VALUE = #{paramValue}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt} where ID = #{id}
